function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Differential impact of lockdown on SARS-CoV-2 outcomes in deprived and less deprived areas","Impact":"Increased spread of disease in most deprived areas during third lockdown","Mitigation":"Targeted interventions in most deprived areas during lockdowns","Technologies":"Digital surveillance and tracking systems for targeted intervention","People":"Residents of most deprived areas","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Variation in SARS-CoV-2 outcomes according to population density","Impact":"Higher incidence and testing rates in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Increased testing and healthcare resources in densely populated areas","Technologies":"Mobile testing units and telemedicine services","People":"Residents of densely populated areas","Owner":"Healthcare providers"}]}
